1110010110011011 1010110111111001 1 -> sum: 1001001110010101, cout: 1
0111000001000101 0110110111111101 1 -> sum: 1101111001000011, cout: 0
1000001001101100 0011001110110101 0 -> sum: 1011011000100001, cout: 0
0111100000010011 1010111110110111 0 -> sum: 0010011111001010, cout: 1
0101010011101111 0011001000101010 0 -> sum: 1000011100011001, cout: 0
1001011011111001 0010000101010110 1 -> sum: 1011100001010000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
